title: Journalism is in danger of bending itself around AI
description: There’s a popular myth that journalism has missed out on the last waves of technological change because it was too slow or too ignorant. The fear of disruption still looms large in an industry increasingly dependent on and battered by a handful of tech companies. Reality, of course, is more complex and messy. Media companies...
